Hello, my name is Yijia (Christiana) Liu. I am a genetic epidemiology student at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. My research interests are in genetics and Autism Spectrum Disorder. I am excited to meet you. In my free time, I like playing the cello, piano, making music and skiing.
